query.sql: select t.item_id, t.item_num, t.period_id, t.regist_user_id, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = t.regist_user_id) regiest_user, t.regist_time, t.exp_time, t.description, p.period_name, (select user_name from sys_user u where u.user_id = t.approve_user_id) approve_user, t.approve_time, t.status, l.dr_amount, l.cr_amount, l.description line_description, concat(a.account_code,'-',a.account_name) account_desc from gl_account_item t,gl_period p,gl_account_item_line l,gl_account a where t.period_id = p.period_id and t.item_id = l.item_id and l.account_id = a.account_id and t.book_set_id = ${@book_set_id} #AND_CLAUSE#
